Title: Flint Particle System for Silverlight
Description: Flint Particle System (Particle Engine) for Silverlight,based on original Flint Particles. XNA framework is not required.
HomeWiki:
Flint Particle System (Particle Engine) for Silverlight.
Migrated from FlintSharp http://code.google.com/p/flint-sharp/.
Based on original Flint Particles http://flintparticles.org/.

This is standalone particle system, XNA framework is not required.
